Summary: Driving to SLC, saw a red sphere light at Lagies Junction where I had not previously seen a light.
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving to SLC (traveling from Ely), I approached Junction and saw a bright red light where I had never seen one before. When I got to the junction, it seemed to have moved. It was west and east of the building at Lagies Junction. What I observed was a bright steady (not blinking) red light, it appeared to be about the size of a street light. It seemed to have moved from when I saw it first (driving) to when I passed it. I thought nothing more of it (other than it was wierd)until I went to the Mufon meeting in Ely last Sat. night. When I saw the films of the UFO, I was surprised that it was so small. When I got home, I realied that I had seen a light at Lagies Junction previously. I checked my bank account for charges in Wendover, and it was August 7, 2009. No photos, I just thought you'd be interesting in knowing that your sighting report was not the only time that lights were seen at that location.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lagies Junction
This sighting has never been favorited.
